title: Relates to smoke detectors in multiple dwellings
summary: Relates to smoke detectors in multiple dwellings.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          605

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  M.  of  A.  MAGNARELLI  -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Housing

       AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to  smoke  detec-
         tors in multiple dwellings

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph (a) of subdivision 2 of section 68 of the  multi-
    2  ple  dwelling  law,  as  added  by  chapter  683 of the laws of 1985, is
    3  amended to read as follows:
    4    (a) The owner of every multiple dwelling to which  the  provisions  of
    5  this  section  apply shall equip each apartment or other separate living
    6  unit in such multiple  dwelling  with  approved  and  operational  smoke
    7  detecting  devices  in  conformity  with  the  state fire prevention and
    8  building code[;  provided,  however,  that  any  multiple  dwelling  not
    9  subject  to  the  provisions  of  such  code may, in the alternative, be
   10  equipped  with  battery-operated  smoke  detecting  devices  of  a  type
   11  accepted by the division of housing and community renewal].
   12    S  2.  This  act  shall  take  effect immediately; provided that every
   13  multiple dwelling shall be in compliance with the provisions of this act
   14  on or before January 1, 2012.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD04144-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the multiple dwelling law, in relation to smoke detectors in multiple dwellings
